articles.title: Coronavirus Europe: More than half of people in Europe will be infected with Omicron over next 6-8 weeks, says WHO - Independent.ie
articles.description: More than half of people across Europe will be infected by the Omicron variant of coronavirus in the next two months, global health leaders have warned as they said Covid-19 cannot yet be called an “endemic” disease.
